description: They're funny, they're rude, and they're wildly imaginative ? they're Terry Moore's comic strip art, and they're offered for the very first time in this special one-shot issue! Terry Moore's... Paradise, Too! contains the best of Moore's pre-Strangers in Paradise work and much of it reveals early developmental versions of SiP's Francine and Katchoo! This collection of Moore's early work has been a top fan request for years. Don't miss it!

This issue spotlights America's Favorite Fairy, Kixie! In a full-length story, Kixie meets Jennifer, a single woman on the fast track to success... and the loony bin. Overworked Jen blames stress for the sudden appearance of a fairy in her life, but Kixie thinks it's kismet!

Oliver Wonderbee is a happy eight-year-old who falls asleep one night and wakes up 18- years-old; his parents are older, he has a girlfriend who wants to know where he's been, and a body he can't get used to! For nine straight days Timmy finds himself racing through his life a decade at a time until he reaches the end and discovers the terrifying challenge he has been brought forth to face!

"Wonderland" -- a charming story about a little boy in a strange land filled with beautiful fairies, cloud farmers, wicked queens, and yellowphants. Plus, Kixie's back, and Plato the Philosophical Polar Bear makes a surprise appearance!

Kixie strips romp across the pages in this latest collection of Paradise whimsy! Kixie the fairy doesn't want Grace to date anybody for fear of having to share her strawberry cake with a "big oaf" in the house. When Kixie finds out that Grace is having a guy over for dinner, the kid gloves come off - no more Missus Nice Fairy! Hilarious cartoon fun from Terry Moore!

Madness abounds! Terry's cartoon alter ego decides he's ready to become a he-man and begins a rigorous workout routine, limiting his soda pops to one an hour and power walking to his home office at the end of the hall. Oh, the pain. Meanwhile, Kixie and Lizzie pay a visit to a local palm reader, with disastrous results. And what the heck is a polar bear doing at Winona Ryder's house?

Michael takes Sheila to a friend's wedding, but Kixie thinks the wedding is for Michael and Sheila... and love hath no fury like a fairy scorned! Can you say "food fight?" Watch Michael's love put to the test in this hilarious issue of PToo!

Three's a crowd! Michael thinks he's coming over to watch the big game on TV, but Sheila has arranged a romantic dinner. As Sheila struggles for Michael's attention, Kixie does everything she can to ruin the unsuspecting Sheila's plans!

It's a day in the life of Kixie! What does a 3" fairy do all day besides eat strawberry cake? Follow America's favorite fairy and find out, as Kixie explores her new home where hidden treasures such as makeup, caffeine, power tools, and lingerie await!

What can you say about Kixie? She's 3 inches tall, loves strawberry cake and flies. She's the most popular fairy in the world (after that show off Tinker Bell!) and she can be found only in the pages of Terry Moore¹s Paradise Too! Read the latest adventures of this precocious little imp along with Plato the Polar Bear, Beeps, and Oliver Wonderbee!

Kixie falls asleep in the pocket of Grace's blind date and wakes up in a strange new world... his apartment! While Grace frantically searches for her beloved lost fairy, Kixie explores the mysteries of a man's life. Other cartoons in this issue include Plato in Wonderland and Beeps!

Oh good grief! Here's the latest collection of cartoons and twisted doodles form the run-amok mind of Terry Moore! Kixie the fairy discovers chocolate, Plato the polar bear ponders the mysteries of life under the aurora borealis, Beeps suffers through a family dinner outing at the local Steak-A-Bob, and Grace buys lingerie through a mail order company with disastrous results. All this and much more from the irresponsible side of Strangers in Paradise creator Terry Moore!
A collection of strips by Terry Moore.
name: Fairyland

description: Since Terry just can't stop drawing cartoons, they've decided to keep publishing them! Now, in a regular bi-monthly series, Paradise Too! collects all the cartoons and comic strips Terry draws on a daily basis that never make it into SIP. The first issue was a roaring success, now issue #2 brings you more of the characters you love... Kixie the high-maintenance fairy; Plato the love-sick polar bear; Morris the ugliest little dog in the world, and many more! If you like the humor in SIP, you owe it to yourself to read Paradise Too!
name: Saving Grace
Vol. 1
Vol. 2

description: After having beaten Darth Vader's imperial forces at the main rebel base on the fourth moon of yavin, Luke Skywalker, C-3PO, R2-D2, and princess Leia embark on a new mission to the second rebel base in the Akuria star system.
name: American Entertainment Exclusive.
Conquistadores!

description: Wrtier and Artist Peyo's first creation, before the Smurfs. The adventures of Johan and his sidekick Pirlouit (Peewit).
name: Le châtiment de Basenhau
Le sette città di Cibola

description: After witnessing his wife burned at the stake, warlord Khalar Zym sets out on a quest to find the mythical Mask of Acheron, an ancient artifact that will bring his beloved back to life. In his search across the lands, Zym destroys a village in northern Cimmeria, where a boy born of battle survives and is cast out into the world, alone. Years later, Zym crosses paths again with the boy who survived-Conan. He must now contend with this barbarian nuisance who is now set on vengeance for the slaughter of his village. Zym and his daughter, Marique, eventually clash with Conan in an epic final battle, the outcome of which will decide the fate of the world.
name: The Mask of Acheron

volume.name: Conan the Barbarian: The Mask of Acheron

description: Johan and Pirlouit are back in this second adventure from writer Peyo
name: Le maître de Roucybeuf

description: This issue tells the story of how Johan and Pirlouit, first meet, and by extension, their first adventure
name: Le Lutin du bois aux roches

description: Johan and Pirlouit, help an injured man, by delivering a stone to his master. They encounter a master of magic, who wants the stone, as much as the man's master does
name: La Pierre de lune

description: Johan and Pirlouit, confront and chase a viking, who has kidnapped a kid.
name: Le Serment des Vikings

description: After the conflict with the viking, the two are shipwrecked on an island, and make immediate conflict with the witch of the island
name: La Source des Dieux

description: Johan and Pirlouit, go out of there way to stop and confront, a group of robbers in a small town
name: La Flèche Noire

description: Pirlouit, is kidnapped by the Montresor Earldom, involved in an intense battle for power
name: Le Sire de Montrésor

description: Snake Eyes captive! Will the death of the most dangerous Joe be the key to who assumes the role of Cobra Commander? Vikrim Khallikhan is betting it is. The COBRA CIVIL WAR builds toward its violent climax with Snake Eyes and Team Foxtrot trapped at the top of the world with a fortress of Vipers between them and survival.
name: Cobra Civil War Part 8

description:
Pirlouit acquires a mystical fluet, which causes the listeners to dance in a maniacal fashion. In order to stop the dancing, the two have to talk to the flute's makers, little blue beings called Smurfs.

This is the first ever appearances of the Smurfs, before they became a standalone title.

Originally called La Flûte à Six Trous, reprints are renamed La Flûte à Six Schtroumpfs.
name: La Flûte à Six Trous

description:
Johan and Pirlouit, bring themselves to a desolate area, where they meet a ghost, whose relatives are fightning for possession of the land.

This is one of the Johan and Pirlouit stories that was adapted in the Smurfs cartoon.
name: La Guerre des Sept Fontaines

description: Johan and Pirlouit meet, the Duke of Castellac, who acts them to help him to return to his kingdom, and find out why the ransom, for his kidnapping, was never paid by his home
name: L’Anneau des Castellac

description: Johan and Pirlouit, are on an adventure, where they meet up with their old friends, The Smurfs. They venture back to the land of Smurfs to help the Smurfs with a big problem.
name: Le Pays Maudit

description: Johan and Pirlouit, meets a talking dog, who is actually a man who was changed into a dog, The duo seek out the Smurfs to help the man,
name: Le Sortilège de Maltrochu

description: Pirlouit leaves because no one appreciates his music. He then gets caught up in a battle, which the Smurfs have also accidently been caught in.
name: La Horde du Corbeau

description: Johan and Pirlouit meet a knight, who is constantly fighting off attackers. When the two ask the knight about it the encounters with the knights, he claims they never happens. He consistently lies and says that the fights never happened.
name: Les Troubadours de Roc-à-Pic

description: Johan, Pirlouit, and Papa Smurf help save a young witch, and her mother.
name: La Nuit des Sorciers

description: Johan and Pirlouit, go to pay a ransom for the king, and realize this is a more dangerous task than they thought.
name: La Rose des Sables

description:
The Wrath of Guardian - Reprinted from The Transformers No. 31.
 
The Wrath of Grimlock - Reprinted from The Transformers No. 32.
name: Summer Special

description:
Mankind held the first invasion back. But then the second wave came... Miles was an ordinary man living an ordinary suburban life, but alien invaders took his home and his wife away. Now that they're back, how have they grown immune to mankind's defenses? And what key role does Miles play in the invasion? What's his link to this extra-terrestrial threat? This edition collects issues #1-6 of the critically acclaimed series.

Chapter Titles

  • [Untitled]
  • Therapy.
  • Remedy.
  • Desperation
  • New America
  • Smokin' Red Head

Millie Collins is finding that her dream of playing tennis is not as easy as she's thought. Her new coach, Walt, has her working day and night, training to get her off the bottom of the Wayde Tennis Academy's ranking. But when a photographer takes an interest in Mill, a whole new wrinkle is added into her life. Can she make time for modeling and still save herself from being expelled?

Cover Price: US $4.99

Format: Color; Standard Comic Issue; 48 pages
name: Book 2

description:
When a rogue agent threatens the entire U.S. intelligence operation by putting classified information on the black market, there is only one man who can stop her: Eric Westfall. Pulled out of his perfect suburban retirement, Westfall must track down the traitorous Emma and eliminate her. But in international espionage all is not what it seems. Eric and Emma have history - a romantic history. And when Eric discovers Emma might have more noble motives in mind - can he complete the mission? Winding its way through the worlds most exotic locales, LEFT ON MISSION provides non-stop excitement and intrigue. A perfect read for for fans of gritty espionage thrillers like CASINO ROYALE and BOURNE IDENTITY.

Chapter Titles

  • Left On Mission ....And Revenge
  • Ibizan Knight
  • Interludes
  • Panoramic View
  • The Sema and the Damage Done
name: TPB

description:
Mark Waid and Mike Wieringo take the reins of FANTASTIC FOUR, and deliver some of the most daring and humorous adventures Marvel's First Family has ever seen! Giant bugs! Living equations! Johnny Storm, CEO! Exploding unstable molecules! The secret behind the Yancy Street Gang!

And watch as the antics between the Thing and the Human Torch heat up like never before! Prepare to laugh and cheer at once!

Collecting Fantastic Four #60-66, plus Waid and 'Ringo's first Mighty Marvel collaboration: 1996's AVENGERS #400.
name: Book One

volume.name: Fantastic Four by Waid and Wieringo Ultimate Collection

description:
Captain America, Iron Man, the Black Widow, Thor, the Vision, Nova and the Invisible Woman - a powerful collective of the greatest heroes the world has ever known!

They are the Avengers, and they want it known they're here to stay. Watch the all-ages action unfold as Nova uncovers a secret that may well tear the team apart, and Reed Richards' plan is revealed at last!

Plus: a double helping of 'Hulk Smash!' as the Green Goliath takes on the Thing and the Abomination in two titanic tussles!

Collecting SUPER HEROES #9-12.
name: Marvel Adventures Avengers: Hulk

description:
When the God of Thunder goes berserk, the most powerful heroes in the universe may not be able to stop him!

See Thor tear through the ranks of Beta Ray Bill, the Silver Surfer, Adam Warlock, Dr. Strange, Drax the Destroyer and Thanos! And when the mad Thor gets his hands on the Infinity Gem of Power, even Odin may be powerless to stop him!

Collecting THOR (1966) #468-471, SILVER SURFER (1987) #86-88, WARLOCK CHRONICLES #6-8 and WARLOCK AND THE INFINITY WATCH #23- 25.
name: Thor: Blood and Thunder

description: The official comics prequel to the Marvel Studios summer blockbuster begins here! As Captain America, Steve Rogers is the inspiration for millions during the dark days of World War Two - but where did he get his inspiration from? How did he meet his best friend, 'Bucky' Barnes? And what set him on the path to becoming the First Avenger? New York Times bestselling writer Fred Van Lente (AMAZING SPIDER-MAN) and star artists Luke Ross (CAPTAIN AMERICA) and Neil Edwards (FANTASTIC FOUR) take you on an all-new adventure to the European battlefields before the movie hits theaters! Collecting CAPTAIN AMERICA: FIRST VENGEANCE #1-4 and material from CAPTAIN AMERICA SPOTLIGHT.
name: TPB

description: From the dark days of World War II to the Heroic Age, witness the brutal battle between Captain America and the immortal evil known as Hydra! How far back has the gruesome group been killing its way to capture the secrets of eternal life? What can Steve Rogers do to halt its sinister spread when the horrific hordes of the undead rise to stop him? Find out as award-winning horror novelist Jonathan Maberry (DOOMWAR) teams with five different artists to capture five different time periods - including Sergio Cariello (Lone Ranger), Tom Scioli (Godland), Phil Winslade (Wonder Woman), Kyle Hotz (ANNIHILATION: CONQUEST - WRAITH) and Graham Nolan (X-MEN FOREVER)! Guest-starring the Falcon, Black Panther, Nomad, Nick Fury and the Avengers! Collecting CAPTAIN AMERICA: HAIL HYDRA #1-5.
name: TPB

description: In the aftermath of SHADOWLAND, Marvel's greatest street heroes - Punisher, Moon Knight, Shroud, Elektra, Paladin, Silver Sable, Ghost Rider, Iron Fist, Falcon, Misty Knight and more - leap into one all-new adventure! Who has brought together these dangerous loners into one fighting force? How is this network different from all other teams? Who is their first target, and what mysteries await them? Discover the answers and enter the action on Marvel's mean streets - courtesy of fan-favorite writers Dan Abnett and Andy Lanning (THE THANOS IMPERATIVE, PUNISHER: YEAR ONE), and artist Brad Walker (GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY)! Collecting HEROES FOR HIRE (2011) #1-5 and material from X-MEN: CURSE OF THE MUTANTS SPOTLIGHT.
name: Heroes for Hire: Control

description: Rome: the pastor of a small church is dismissed without explanation after discovering a passage that leads to a catacomb unknown. Florence Martin Mystere at his home is subjected to an unusual interrogation. Negev Desert: ambiguous characters go to an appointment in the site of the Biblical city of Gomorrah. An object disappeared during the sack of Rome is the center of an "Italian mystery" that only the Detective of the Impossible is able to solve.
name: Il castigo degli Elohim

description: in Cambodia, among the ruins of the fabled city of Angkor Wat, the ancient capital of the Khmer empire, the "Golden Buddha", a priceless artifact, returns to light. Martin is in Angkor to record a television program on archaeological excavations and attempts to discover the origin of the "Golden Buddha", helped (or perhaps hindered) by an old cambodian and a mysterious bar tender.
name: Il Budda d'oro

description: Martin Mystere must stop a dangerous serial killer already appeared in France in the nineteenth century and that has to do with the "cartoons" of that period .
name: La tredicesima fatica

description: Again, the past returns in Martin ’s present. This time he must try to save, with the help of Tinker Bell, Peter Pan’s Neverneverland, threatened by an unexplained and sudden aging.
name: Ritorno alla terra che non c'è

description: A real throwback for Martin Mystere , who is once more in Atlantis with Orloff , to try to bring a military satellite back to its time: t he satellite that triggered the destruction of Atlantis and Mu 10,000 years ago ...
name: Il destino di Atlantide

description: Dylan is hired by a gang of kids who have discovered the ghost of Lula, a young woman died in an accident and caught in a clearing that has to share with the angry ghost of a small dog.
name: Anime prigioniere

description:
In this issue:

1. Totentanz

2. Delitti d'amore

3. Il Giorno del Giudizio
name: Totentanz

description:
In this issue:

  1. L’inquilino del terzo piano
  2. Taxi!
  3. Angoscia
  4. Margherite
name: L’inquilino del terzo piano

description:
In this issue:

  1. Marionette
  2. Falce di Luna
name: Marionette

description:
In this issue: 
  1. Cronache di straordinaria follia
  2. Era morta
  3. Delitti a passo di danza
  4. Il vicino di casa
name: Cronache di straordinaria follia

description:
In this issue:

  1. Il canto della sirena
  2. Serial killer
  3. L'ultima mutazione
  4. Un incubo in soffitta
name: Il canto della sirena

description: Collecting Showcase Presents #6, 7, 11, 12 and Challengers of the Unknown #1-18 (1957-1959)! Relive the classic Silver Age adventures of Jack Kirby's Challengers of the Unknown — a team brought together by fate dedicated to a life of harrowing adventure in the name of good!
name: Volume 1

volume.name: Showcase Presents: Challengers Of The Unknown

description: Thrill to more than 500 pages of comic action collected from CHALLENGERS OF THE UNKNOWN #18-37 (1961-1964)! Along the way, the intrepid foursome faces dangers of every imaginable sort, including cosmic-powered alien beasts, doomed worlds, futuristic knights and much more.
name: Volume 2

volume.name: Showcase Presents: Challengers Of The Unknown

description: Take to the skies in this thrilling volume collecting OUR ARMY AT WAR #151, 153, 155, SHOWCASE #57-58, STAR-SPANGLED WAR STORIES #138-152 , 158, 181-183, and 200, DETECTIVE COMICS #404, MEN AT WAR #1-3, 8-10, 12-14, 19-20, THE UNKNOWN SOLDIER #252-253, 260-261, 265-267 and DC SPECIAL #26!
name: Volume 1

description:
In this issue:

  1. Il masticatore di sudari
  2. Sangue di lupo
  3. Morte di una stella
  4. Il mistero dell'isola d'Yd
name: Il masticatore di sudari

description: In the days before the terrible events of Ragnarok, the Gods of Asgard stare across the ramparts of their city towards a massive, demonic army massed at the gates — the prophesied End of All Days is about to begin. As the armies of darkness begin their initial attacks, Thor confronts Loki, who is destined to usher in the fall of Asgard. But what he learns from the Loki may change the way he sees his treacherous half-brother. For perhaps this terrible event is a time also of renewal. Perhaps in this desperate hour even the God of Lies has a purpose.
name: The Day Before Winter
